definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: In our life it is often the trivia that makes us unhappy.
sentences.chinese: 生活中使我們不快樂的常是一些芝麻小事。

sentences.english: The latest uproar in his family is much ado about nothing.
sentences.chinese: 他家最近的爭端，只是芝麻小事，毫無意義。

sentences.english: Wen Xiang never imagined that minor event just now would alarm the top officials.
sentences.chinese: 文祥想不到剛纔那一點芝麻小事，竟然就驚動了層峯。

sentences.english: No tale is too obscure for English teacher Blaikie.
sentences.chinese: 英語老師布萊基沒有放過一切一件芝麻小事。

sentences.english: Focus on petty problems and your life will swiftly fill up with them.
sentences.chinese: 專注於芝麻小事，你的生活將迅速被它們填補。

sentences.english: My parents tend to be very angry at the smallest things.
sentences.chinese: 我的父母很容易因爲一些芝麻小事而生氣。

sentences.english: You shouldn't get all worked up over such a little thing.
sentences.chinese: 你不應該對這種芝麻小事大驚小怪的。

sentences.english: Although this is a sesame seed bagatelle only, but do you know?
sentences.chinese: 雖然這只是件芝麻小事，但是你知道嗎？

definition: lit. chicken feathers and garlic skins (idiom)/fig. trivial (matter)
to haggle over every ounce/(fig.) to fuss over minor matters/to split hairs
lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
to criticize (as a matter of principle)
to be difficult with sb/to provoke disagreement/at loggerheads/to fall out with
to quarrel/to have a row/quarrel/CL:頓|顿[dun4]
lit. stale grain, overcooked sesame (idiom); fig. the same boring old gossip
pinyin: chen2 gu3 zi5 lan4 zhi1 ma5
